about_the_game:
House of Secrets is a gripping stealth horror game where you step into the shoes of a curious protagonist determined to uncover the dark mysteries lurking within your neighbor's eerie mansion. As you quietly explore the shadowy halls and hidden rooms, you’ll discover disturbing clues and unsettling secrets that hint at a terrifying truth. Avoid detection at all costs as the house seems to have a mind of its own, with unknown dangers watching your every move. In this game, every creak, every whisper, and every shadow hides a piece of the puzzle—can you unveil the secrets before they consume you?

  • Dynamic Stealth System: Use shadows, sound, and careful movement to avoid detection by the mansion's eerie inhabitants, adding tension and strategy to your exploration.
  • Interactive Objects: Fully interactive environments where players can manipulate objects, search for clues, and trigger events that affect the course of the game.
  • Adaptive AI: Terrifying enemies with advanced AI that learn from the player’s actions, creating intense and personalized encounters that keep players on edge.
  • Branching Storylines: A narrative that changes based on player choices, leading to multiple endings and encouraging replayability to uncover all the secrets of the houses.
  • And More!

content_descriptors.notes: Their may be references of tobacco and drugs
